original_title: Sri Lanka rupee opens at 322/327 to dollar, bonds up
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s treasury bond yields were up at open on Tuesday, dealers said.
A 01.07.2025 bond was quoted at 31.00/30 percent on Tuesday, up from 30.75/31.00 percent on Monday.
A 15.09.2027 bond was quoted at 28.25/29.00 percent, up from 28.10/60 percent from Monday.
Sri Lanka rupee opened at 322/327 against the US dollar steady, from 322/325 from a day earlier. (Colombo/ March28/2023)
